he had taken from the pris- oner. 
"Sell us that horse!" Denfsov called out to the Cossacks. 
"If you like, your honor!" 
The officers got up and stood round the Cos- sacks and their prisoner. The French dragoon was a young Alsatian who spoke French with a German accent. He was breathless with agita- tion, his face was red, and when he heard some French spoken he at once began speaking to the officers, addressing first one, then another. He said he would not have been taken, it was not his faul
